title: Robert Curvin, Scholar Who Fought Bias and Poverty in Newark, Dies at 81
text:
Published By: NYTimes NY Region - Today 
Dr. Curvin, a co-founder of the Newark chapter of the Congress of Racial Equality, helped make Kenneth A. Gibson the first black mayor of a ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
